name: Thomas W Rohrer
what_you_do: The website focuses on improving the ability to perform effectively through a brain-based therapeutic approach called Brainspotting.
who_you_serve: The website states they work with high-level athletes, other public performers, and regular people who want to improve their ability to perform in their personal, social or professional life.
business_focus: Improving performance and eliminating mental blocks through a brain-based therapeutic approach.
service_provided: Brainspotting, cognitive-behavioral psychology, neuro linguistic programming, mindful creativity, positive psychology, structural thinking
